conclusion: Determine which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into after passing through baffles.
The baffles are located at points A, B, C, D, and E.
Baffles are used to control the flow of the liquid.
Liquid will flow out from A, B, and C.
Liquid will flow through the baffles at points A, B, and C.
Liquid will flow into container D after passing through the baffles at points A, B, and C.
